alert.note: Alert for Hardeman; Wilbarger (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 31 at 7:30PM CDT until May 31 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Jackson County in southwestern Oklahoma... Southeastern Harmon County in southwestern Oklahoma... Southeastern Greer County in southwestern Oklahoma... Northwestern Wilbarger County in northern Texas... Northeastern Hardeman County in northern Texas... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 728 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles southeast of Gould, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Altus, Blair, Olustee, Eldorado, Martha, Gould, Elmer, Friendship, Altus Air Force Base, Duke, Warren, Fargo, Humphreys, Odell, Hester, McQueen and Hess. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
